attributes.action: create a national music archive and museum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a vast amount of high quality music composed and performed in this country.

The music is original, diverse and has often been world leading. It covers all tastes and has a wide ethnic background.

While many pieces of music are famous for a short time. When there popularity fades there is a danger of it being lost. How many classical composers can you name?

The archive and museum could be a repository for written and recorded music and could have areas for studying and performing music.

There are many locations which would be suitable and might generate money for the local area.

A national music archive and museum would be a welcome cultural addition to this country.
